attributes.action: Get "The Slippery Slide" by William William Rodgers on the right Spotify account
attributes.additional_details: It would be nice if you could do something right for a change.
attributes.background: Some goose at Spotify has put my new single "The Slippery Slide" on the wrong account. If you sort this out for me I will degrade myself in the worst way possible and join the Conservative Party (for a bit).

rejection.details: The management of Spotify accounts is the responsibility of Spotify and the individual account holders and not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.
